name: Untitled Zine Game
description:
A new craze is sweeping Derndale, PA: Adventure Zines! Serialized role playing adventures. A total world to enchant the mind. Everyone is playing them, all the time! It's all we ever do anymore. Why, I'm playing one right now! Wouldn't you just love to come here and read some zines? And talk to strangers?

====

This is an early WIP build to test out some mechanics and themes. Let me know what you think!

Controls:

WASD = move
space = jump
1/2 = open zine
left click / right click = page forward / back within zine
q = close zine
